subject: Re: [junit] Re: Migrating Junit 4.10 to 3.8.1
msgSnippet: ... Make an appointment with the professor. Show him how 3.8.1 is old and buggy and not current. Show him how the new version is still open source, free to
messageBody:
On 9/6/12 7:38 PM, gonzalezsj@... wrote:
>
> Junit 3.8.1 is the default Version my proffessor demands.
>

Make an appointment with the professor. Show him how 3.8.1 is old and
buggy and not current.
Show him how the new version is still open source, free to all, etc.

Do not show up the professor in class, we tend to get grumpy when that
happens and we remember who made us look bad.

pat


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
